ðŸ“– Summary: BeforeAfter is a browser-based tool for comparing and combining images, particularly useful for visualizing changes. It offers features like side-by-side comparison, visual diff highlighting, clipboard pasting, drag-and-drop support, and customizable appearance. The tool requires no installation and runs entirely in the browser.
